title: code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc: the [name] argument no longer works with an ellipsis (...)
body:
by **vbatts**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. go get code.google.com/p/go.tools/cmd/godoc
2. godoc net/...
3.

What is the expected output?
Ouput of all the documentation matching that pattern. This was the case before godoc was
moved solely to go.tools.

What do you see instead?
2014/01/23 22:42:19 open /usr/lib64/go/src/pkg/net/...: no such file or directory

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?


Which operating system are you using?
linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.2 linux/amd64

and parent: 671:bc4ebf95868d tip of code.google.com/p/go.tools

Please provide any additional information below.
Behavior expected similar to `go list net/...`, except to render the documentation of
that pattern
